Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to protections against anti-Semitism in the human rights law and the hate crimes statute
Summary: Provides protections against anti-Semitism in the human rights law and the hate crimes statute.
LawCode: Amd §§292 & 297, Exec L; amd §485.05, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the penal law, in relation to protections against anti-Semitism in the human rights law
